Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Be precise. A lack of precision is dangerous when the margin of error is small

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Treat each federal dollar as if it was hard earned; it was - by a taxpayer

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is about dreaming and making other people dream

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned how to appreciate what I have. And it's a lot. I'm very lucky

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is a weapon that you can use when you need it

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no good being too easily swayed by people's opinions. You have to believe in yourself

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I like perfume and flowers

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: My style is not that big. I wear heels, tight pants, and I wear diamonds

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is all about happiness. It's fun. It's important. But it's not medicine

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: Die and born again, die and born again. It's the story of my life

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I think glamour all the time. I wake up in the morning and I'm already thinking glamour

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: A business woman needs a successful mix of design and practicality

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want your checkbook to follow your heart, make a donation to those doing work you support

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: Every member of my family was displaced by Katrina

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes but one person, one moment, one conviction, to start a ripple of change

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: My mama told me it's not what they call you - it's what you answer to

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: Civic education and civic responsibility should be taught in elementary school

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure. It doesn't exist. 'Failure' is just what happens when we lose perspective

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: I am ashamed of some of Democrats in my own party

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: No voters will be left behind

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: A campaign is about defining who you are - your vision and your opponent's vision

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Delete the negative; accentuate the positive!

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Evening is a time of real experimentation. You never want to look the same way

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is a constant challenge to balance comfort with luxe, the practical with the desirable

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do is a matter of heart, body and soul

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, I was a hippie and still am a flower child

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather promote New York than anything else in this world because New York to me means the world

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything in life... has to have balance

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I was a nomad in another life

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was a working woman, and I was alone a lot. So I wanted to be a stay-at-home mom

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: Martial art is a form of expression, an expression from your inner self to your hands and legs

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: When you watch my films, you're feeling my heart

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, shooting, editing, and scoring rely on rhythm

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been in a rebel

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: As an action director, I always try to bring something fresh and new

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like to choose projects that will allow me as an artist to make my art

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly hope 'Dragon' can leave some legacy behind

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: I got nominated for my second film as best young director in the Aikido Film Festival in Japan

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very emotional guy

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are not quite so simple always as black and white

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer falls in love with an idea and gets carried away

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: I've worked hard all my life. You have to if you want to get things done

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: In university they don't tell you that the greater part of the law is learning to tolerate fools

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sure that everybody feels a kind of permanent anguish about what's going on in the world

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: I do have a sense, and I've never not had it, of how easily things can vanish

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: Small things amuse small minds

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: What is a hero without love for mankind

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: Man, who is he? Too bad, to be the work of God: Too good for the work of chance!

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: What greater bliss than to look back on days spent in usefulness, in doing good to those around us

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: I must study alone, as I am condemned to do every thing alone, I believe, in this life

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: My happiest hours are spent in school, surrounded by those I hope to benefit

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: I worship talents almost. I sinfully dare mourn that I possess them not

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: My wish is to be known only thru my work

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: Pleasures take to themselves wings and fly away; true knowledge remains forever

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: Men need knowledge in order to overpower their passions and master their prejudices

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: No blessing, no good, can follow in the path trodden by slavery

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: They say, 'Nothing can be done here!' I reply, 'I know no such word in the vocabulary I adopt!'

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who do wrong very often think others are censuring them, when they are not even thought of

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: We have all known the long loneliness, and we have found that the answer is community

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: They cannot see that we must lay one brick at a time, take one step at a time

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: I firmly believe that our salvation depends on the poor

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: Love casts out fear, but we have to get over the fear in order to get close enough to love them

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot build up the idea of the apostolate of the laity without the foundation of the liturgy

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: The legal battle against segregation is won, but the community battle goes on

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't call me a saint. I don't want to be dismissed so easily

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: Women think with their whole bodies and they see things as a whole more than men do

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are as strong and powerful as bombs, as napalm

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really liked my short hair; it never occurred to me that people would want it

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Princess Diana probably had the most famous haircut, or Farrah Fawcett or Jennifer Aniston

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: My legs are ice skaters' legs. No tan in sight

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: At times, I feel overwhelmed and my depression leads me into darkness

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is evil

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents didn't have a lot of money, but we never knew that. They really did the best they could

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: My coach was a great politician, so he did most of the work. He was good

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: If I hadn't been born a woman, I would have certainly been gay

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made a commitment to concentrate on my career as an entertainer

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think television really captures the speed and the power of skating

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have a quotation for everything - it saves original thinking

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: A human being must have occupation, of he or she is not to become a nuisance to the world

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: The only sin passion can commit is to be joyless

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: The great advantage about telling the truth is that nobody ever believes it

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: Trouble shared is trouble halved

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: Very dangerous things, theories

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: A continual atmosphere of hectic passion is very trying if you haven't got any of your own

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: If it were not for the war, this war would suit me down to the ground

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who make some other person their job... are dangerous

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: Ice cream brings people together

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: I took an oath of office to protect Arizona from all enemies, foreign and domestic

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: I strongly believe that more money needs to be spent in the classroom

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: Every dollar spent on education should go toward helping our teachers teach and our students learn

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: Our teachers are valuable, and our public policy should reflect that

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: I ran for public office to do something good

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to see us add more dollars to the classroom

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: A great economy requires great public schools

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm committed as governor to valuing and nurturing our relationships with our friends to the south

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: As our economy advances, our government and our laws need to modernize, too

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nostalgia is a file that removes the rough edges from the good old days

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: A weed is a plant that has mastered every survival skill except for learning how to grow in rows

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people mistake a short memory for a clear conscience

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Establishing goals is all right if you don't let them deprive you of interesting detours

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with learning from experience is that you never graduate

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Real elation is when you feel you could touch a star without standing on tiptoe

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Instead of giving a politician the keys to the city, it might be better to change the locks

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: Forget sex or politics or religion, loneliness is the subject that clears out a room

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: Workshops and seminars are basically financial speed dating for clueless people

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: You wait for fate to bring about the changes in life which you should be bringing about by yourself

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: The person who needs the other person the least in a relationship is the stronger member

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: Good-looking people with strong, fluoridated teeth get things handed to them on platters

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: Eagles are seagulls with a good hairdo

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: Adventure without risk is Disneyland

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: We decided that the French could never write user-friendly software because they're so rude

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: If cats were double the size they are now, they'd probably be illegal

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't make eye contact when people sing 'Happy Birthday' to me

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I firmly believe there are no bad people

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm acting, I just come up with people I've known, and I stick with it

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: As an actor, you are either emulating someone else, or some version of yourself

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always felt like I was just sort of waiting to catch up to the rest of myself

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Truthfully, I'm incredibly shy, and I'm very awkward around boys

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very competitive and academic

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure, they can take your binder, but they can't take whatever special thing you have inside you

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a really big fan of all things macabre in general; Halloween happens to be my favorite holiday

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the snow! I actually cannot stand the beach

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother got pregnant with me at the age of fifteen. This was '64, and unheard of at that time

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather deal with Tipper than Bush. He's trying to kill everybody in jail

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: Black women are the strongest most hardworking people on earth

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: I got Ice Cube his start. I also launched Eazy-E

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to get my music out and make sure that it's heard in the right way

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: Mission accomplished, we didn't have any problems as far as violence goes

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never gonna stop music, it's like air to me

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: I am never going to give music up

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm gonna try and change the course of hip hop again

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: The only two things that scare me are God and the IRS

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to love me, but it's not going to hurt me if they don't

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be stinky poo poo girl, I want to be happy flower child

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm such a profound believer that timing is everything; I would tattoo that on my arm

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that being happy makes the biggest impact on your physical appearance

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: My life choices are not supposed to be the gateway to somebody else's. That's my journey

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Cali girl through and through

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something liberating about not pretending. Dare to embarrass yourself. Risk

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to be blown away when I do what they don't expect

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to go through hell... I suggest you come back learning something

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no way I can justify my salary level, but I'm learning to live with it

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in overcoming and achieving and doing things and not feeling sorry for yourself

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I could still eat a cheeseburger if I wanted to. I just can't have them every day

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the normalcy of Cleveland. There's regular people there

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: You know that look women get when they want sex? Me neither

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: When I play poker, I don't like losing the pot

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I just try to get people to laugh - I'm not trying to change the world or anything

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: The Marines gave me a really strong sense of discipline and a work ethic that kicks in at my job

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, and once, when I was in the Marines, I got a perfect score on my physical fitness test

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in the band when I was a kid, I played the trumpet

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust that little voice in your head that says 'Wouldn't it be interesting if...'; And then do it

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: The question of truth is forever in the air, and people look for it with particular fervor in art

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: Art has to address eternal issues

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: All good children's books, I think, address metaphysical issues in some kind of way

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: Photography deals exquisitely with appearances, but nothing is what it appears to be

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: All good work has magic in it, and addresses the mind in a subtle way

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: To fulfil a fantasy is the quickest way to destroy it

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: In the West, people tend to look at life as spectators, but in the East, people are the thing

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: My work is about my life as an event, and I find myself to be very temporal, transient

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: The two basic items necessary to sustain life are sunshine and coconut milk

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Blame is for God and small children

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I did a movie called Marathon Man and it was one of my best memories

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Life stinks, but that doesn't mean you don't enjoy it

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is no direct threat why are we invading?

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: In my room as a kid... I'd play a fighter and get knocked to the floor and come back to win

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Myth is supposed to bring us together, but fantasy alienates us

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: A good review from the critics is just another stay of execution

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I decided to become an actor because I was failing in school and I needed the credits

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I did some writing and bought a book, and have been working on that as a film to act and direct in

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I love you, I show you I love you every day. Little things, big things

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Not only do I think being nice and kind is easy but being kind, in my opinion, is important

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Wrestling was like stand-up comedy for me

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I want someone who can trust that my big hands are going to take care of them

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, I can keep many secrets, so I would be a phenomenal secret agent. I love secrets

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nutrition is so important. It can't be stressed enough

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal was never to be the loudest or the craziest. It was to be the most entertaining

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to use the hard times in the past to motivate me today

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: When he speaks to you he speaks with an earnest vibe and an earnest energy

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing I couldn't identify with was the blue cowboy outfit he put on

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had more trouble with myself than with any other man

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: If I take care of my character, my reputation will take care of me

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: Church attendance is as vital to a disciple as a transfusion of rich, healthy blood to a sick man

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: Never think that Jesus commanded a trifle, nor dare to trifle with anything He has commanded

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: The Bible will keep you from sin, or sin will keep you from the Bible

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: We can stand affliction better than we can prosperity, for in prosperity we forget God

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: Where one man reads the Bible, a hundred read you and me

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: Character is what a man is in the dark

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me a man who says this one thing I do, and not those fifty things I dabble in

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: Musicians exist independent of any of the marketing terms or the categorization

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: I live out of cans a lot. But I try to indulge only in healthy canned food

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: It's meant to reaffirm the validity of that music - clean, minimalist, honest, classic music

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: I embrace country music because of love, a love of what I came from

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: We share something in common with the fabric of the whole universe that connects us

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been just kind of consumed by my own thoughts

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: I like order. It allows me to have chaos in my head

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: Control success before it controls you

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: I tried to pay some small tribute to A Man and a Woman (1966) with the recurring musical theme

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't regret any of the musical decisions I have made

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: No team works out teamwork

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: Over my career, I've had to adjust my game

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the main thing for kids is to have them believe in themselves

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest thing is to let your voice be heard, let your story be heard

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: Fatherhood is the best thing that could happen to me, and I'm just glad I can share my voice

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: A turtleneck is about sophistication

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Chicago, and I understand what Michael Jordan symbolizes

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just showing my personality in my clothing

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think the world focuses on the positive things enough

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: Players are ready to play, We're not on strike. It's a lockout

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: Summer is very precious

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: Candy is childhood, the best and bright moments you wish could have lasted forever

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: When I think of flavours, I think colour, so lemon should be yellow and orange is orange

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no denying that candy is comfort food and it's affordable

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: I always liked the idea of leadership and being a captain

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe dancing is the best stress reliever

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: My friends call me Clark Kent: I'm known to change in phone booths

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: Red candy is my favorite - I like red string licorice, Swedish Fish, and red gum balls

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I own has some significance to me

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Have I had therapy? I went to a yoga class once

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Paper acts as an eraser on the mind, as soon as you look at what you've written

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: The trend now is to get away from stage bound sitcoms

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very low level of recognition, which is fine by me

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not going to learn anything if you're not prepared to go flat, so I'm very happy to go flat

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing that's coming up a lot is: are you as grumpy as you appear from this Black Books thing

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a lot of the time you just parody yourself

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually about as famous as a fourth division footballer from the 70s

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm organised in some ways, but not in others

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not walk around imaging myself to be intimidating or smart

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: When one burns one's bridges, what a very nice fire it makes

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody's boring me. I think it's me

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: He who seeks rest finds boredom. He who seeks work finds rest

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Though lovers be lost love shall not

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I've just had eighteen straight whiskies. I think that's the record

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: The land of my fathers. My fathers can have it

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: The function of posterity is to look after itself
